mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Simmons, Hollan
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: West Climay, Kalmazoo Co., Michigan [West Climay, Kalamazoo County, Michigan]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Simmons, Hollan Patient Age: 21. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of right ankle joint: Bullet entered at lower edge of external maleolus [malleolus] passing horizontally forward and lodged at the head of the metatarsal bone of the great toe comminuting the tarsal bone. Amputation on the field lower third, surgeon unknown.. Location Wounded: Near Winchester, Va while skirmishing. Date Wounded: 1864/09/19. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Treatment: Simple dressings. Stump healed. Amputated on the field. Result: Transferred to US Genl Hospl Detroit, Michigan 1864/12/16.
